about_the_game:
STORY

Fertiliel - Cupid Simulator is a visual novel/social puzzle that takes place in the city of HaruTokyo, a testament to humanity's resilience and spirit. Rebuilt from the ruins of a devastating war, the country now faces a dire challenge: declining fertility rates. As part of the newly formed Department of Fertility Balance, Fertiliel's mission is to restore harmony and help humanity flourish amidst a society of humans, angels, and demons.

As Fertiliel, a celestial servant, your objective is to match couples and foster relationships to boost the city's birth rates. Each episode presents a turn-limited challenge to strategically bring characters together, uncovering their hidden preferences through observation and subtly influencing their interactions. With every successful match, you bring HaruTokyo one step closer to overcoming its demographic crisis.

MATCHMAKING GAMEPLAY / SOCIAL PUZZLE

Observe and interact with characters in various settings to use your divine powers to subtly Suggest conversation topics and actions. Strategically pair characters to form relationships that'll bear many children in the future!

UNIQUE CHARACTER MECHANICS

The diverse characters have distinct personalities, hidden preferences and personality traits you can investigate/discover during gameplay. Using these information, you can influence their interactions and relationships with other characters.

SOLVE PUZZLES TO HELP COUPLES DURING DATES

Couples will usually have difficulties during dates. Help them during these times (using an item or choosing the best option available) to facilitate memorable dates and become inseparable. You can even utilize items and disguises to enhance these interactions.

CUSTOMIZABLE ELEMENTS

You can customize character visuals and names, and even conversation themes they'll engage during missions!

FUNDED BY


This game was funded in partnership with Ancine (Brazilian Cinema Agency), BRDE and FSA. This is a Brazilian governmental investment.
